thread.title: Lonsin Capital And Its Affiliates Submitted An Indication Of Interest To Acquire The Majority Of APWC

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Lonsin Capital And Its Affiliates Submitted An Indication Of Interest To Acquire The Majority Of APWC

organizations.name: asia pacific wire & cable corp ltd

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corp Ltd :
* LONSIN CAPITAL AND ITS AFFILIATES SUBMITTED AN INDICATION OF INTEREST TO ACQUIRE THE MAJORITY OF APWC
* ‍LONSIN CAPITAL LIMITED SAYS IT HAS INTENTION TO ACQUIRE A MAJORITY OF APWC US AT US$4.00 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
